DzIndexList Class Reference
[Basic Types]

Represents a sorted list of indices - such as a group of vertices, or faces. More...

#include <dzindexlist.h>

Detailed Description

Represents a sorted list of indices - such as a group of vertices, or faces.

DzIndexList::DzIndexList ( const DzIndexList &  list  ) 

Copy constructor. Since this class does not currently support data sharing, this operation copies the list, and can therefore be expensive.

Finds an index in the list.

DzIndexList & DzIndexList::operator= ( const DzIndexList &  list  ) 

Assignment operator. This class does not currently support data sharing, so this operation copies the entire list, and can therefore be quite expensive.

Parameters:
list The list to copy
Returns:
This list.
void DzIndexList::preSizeArray ( int  count  ) 

Presizes the list.

Parameters:
count The number of items to allocate room for in the size of the list.
bool DzIndexList::removeComponent ( int  idx  )  [slot]

This function is typically called when a component (e.g. vertex or face) has been removed from the list that the indices in this list reference. This function removes the given index from the list if it is found, and decrements all indices in the list greater than the given index in order to 'clean-up' the list of indices.

Parameters:
idx The index of the item that needs to be removed.
Returns:
true on sucess, otherwise false.
bool DzIndexList::removeIndex ( int  idx  )  [slot]

Removes the given index from the list.

Parameters:
idx The index to remove from the list.
int * DzIndexList::setCount ( int  count  ) 

Resizes the index list.

Parameters:
count The new size of the index list.
Returns:
A pointer to the index list.
